title: Micro-cosmographie, or, A peece of the world discovered in essayes and characters.
author: Earle, John, 1601?-1665.
publisher: Printed by William Stansby for Edward Blount,
notes: Attributed to Earle by STC (2nd ed.) and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
